project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password containing uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters with a configurable length.

task.name: Implement password generation logic to include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Add functionality to allow the user to configure the password length
Write tests to verify the password generation for various lengths and character sets
Execute tests on the implemented password generation feature to ensure it works correctly
